pages.text: $(br)$(key)Target Dummies$() are used to test your combat performance. $(bold)Right-click a block$() to place it, and $(bold)left-click with an empty hand$() to remove it.$(br2)You can equip it with different armor and gear by $(bold)right-clicking it$() with the item. To remove a piece, $(bold)right-click the corresponding body part with an empty hand$().
